Join us at the Dubai Corporate Games! 

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=275&user=10620> 	

The Dubai Corporate Games are starting this weekend, February 15-16, at the Inspiratus District, Dubai Sports City.

With several Chalhoub Group teams competing, let’s come together to cheer them on, show our support, and celebrate our team spirit.
 
View the games schedule here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=276&user=10620> . 

See you there! 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Jimmy Choo Ramadan Collection

chunks.text:
With several Chalhoub Group teams competing, let’s come together to cheer them on, show our support, and celebrate our team spirit.
 
View the games schedule here <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=276&user=10620> . 

See you there! 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-3-min.png> 	

Jimmy Choo Ramadan Collection

Jimmy Choo unveils an exclusive capsule collection this Ramadan with six exclusive shoe and bag designs, showcasing the brand’s signature glamour and expert craftsmanship. The collection is offered in a rich palette of gold, macaron, and aqua green. Meticulously crafted in luxurious materials including hotfix crystal, printed leather, perforated suede, satin, and metallic nappa leather, each piece reimagines timeless glamour in a modern way. Available in Jimmy Choo Boutiques now!
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=277&user=10620> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-2-min.png> 	

Country Management Townhall

Jimmy Choo unveils an exclusive capsule collection this Ramadan with six exclusive shoe and bag designs, showcasing the brand’s signature glamour and expert craftsmanship. The collection is offered in a rich palette of gold, macaron, and aqua green. Meticulously crafted in luxurious materials including hotfix crystal, printed leather, perforated suede, satin, and metallic nappa leather, each piece reimagines timeless glamour in a modern way. Available in Jimmy Choo Boutiques now!

Country Management Townhall

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=278&user=10620> 	
Last week, Country Management hosted their first townhall of the year, where the team focused on the key achievements of 2024, welcomed Michael Chalhoub and announced the BRAVO Award winners. 
Read more to find out who won what!  <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=278&user=10620> 
For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=279&user=10620>
